attributes.action: create regional passenger transport executives to replace the existing anarchic arrangments that are in place now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people live more regional lives than they used to.The current arrangments which were introduced in 1974 are nolonger relevant to peoples lives.I believe that the interests of the travelling public would be better served by planning and running public transport on aregional  basis
